text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-Dentition where concept is-a PrimaryDentition

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-Dentition
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    PrimaryDentitionPrimary dentitionPrimary dentition, the first teeth to errupt and usually replaced with permanent dentition

name: PrimaryDentition
title: PrimaryDentition
description: Primary dentition, the first teeth to errupt and usually replaced with permanent dentition
